Taunton.Higgins-Hodgeman House:
The Higgins-Hodgeman House is a historic house located at 19 Cedar Street in Taunton, Massachusetts.


== Description and history ==
It was built in 1880 for L. B. Higgins, a merchant who operated a dry goods business downtown. The 2-1/2 story frame house is considered one of the best examples of Stick style architecture in the city.
